events.message: I received my order yesterday, but the product is not what I expected and I would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The case has been reviewed and categorized under Refund based on the customer's request for money back.
An agent has been assigned to assist with the refund request for the order placed by the customer.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. Iâ€™m here to help you with the refund process for your recent purchase.
Could you please provide your order number and the reason for the refund request to proceed efficiently?
My order number is 12345678, and the product did not match the description and was not functional as expected.
Thank you for the details. We will initiate the refund and provide you with a prepaid shipping label to return the item.
That sounds good to me. I appreciate the quick response and look forward to receiving the label soon.
The refund process has been completed and the return label sent to your email. Please let us know if you need further assistance.
Just following up to confirm that you received the refund and that everything is now resolved to your satisfaction.
We are closing this case now. Thank you for your patience and please contact us anytime for further help.
We have sent you a short satisfaction survey. Your feedback helps us improve our services. Thank you!
